value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|B-Brother! ...A-and Xander!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica? You're...here?$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|It has been quite some time,
Princess Veronica.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I am glad to find both of you safe...
I was worried.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|I'm sorry if we caused you concern...
We have not yet reached our goal,
however, and must leave again soon.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But...you can't!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$EFace|You should come along with us,
Veronica. It will be dangerous, but...
at least you wouldn't be lonely.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Brother, I...$k$pYes. Of course I'll come with you...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...I'm sorry, Zacharias, but there is
something I would like your help
with as well.$k$pA friend of mine has informed me
that this world is currently under
attack by nightmares...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Hm. Nightmares, you say?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I understand if that seems impossible
to you, but if you meet my friend
and listen...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You should, Brother. Their friend
is just over there, near the forest,
playing with Princess Sharena...$k$pThough, I'm not sure whether it will
do any good, given the nature of
this...friend of theirs.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|So, there's a chance you are being
deceived, then?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|No, the information feels trustworthy.
So, please, Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...All right, then. Alfonse, if you
believe so strongly, I will talk to
this friend of yours.$k$pRegardless of the authenticity of her
claims about the alleged nightmares,
I will hear her out. Will that suffice?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you...$k$p$Sbs5000|$EFace_Anger|...imposter.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...What did you say?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|No one ever mentioned our friend
is a she, so there's no way you could
have known that unless...$k$p$EFace_Anger|...Unless you, too, are part of the
nightmare! Now, step away from
Princess Veronica.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Heh... Heh heh heh...
Heh heh heh heh heh.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|Heh heh heh...
Heh heh heh heh...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother? ...Xander?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Wait! Princess Veronica!
They're not—$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|What is it, Alfonse? You want the
dream to end?$k$pWe were so looking forward to
killing your mother again. In your
reality this time, and everything...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Aha! You ARE nightmare Zacharias!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My brother...and Xander...
Both vanishing...again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That was only a twisted copy of him,
made from my nightmares... It wasn't
the Zacharias we know.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but it...they...$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|So. You are all going to meet this
ljósálfr, are you, Prince Alfonse?$k$p...I will accompany you. It seems you
may be able to figure this situation
of ours out after all...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Princess Veronica.
Your help is appreciated.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Don't thank me. I am not doing
this for you.$k$pI just...want to see my brother.
I've been waiting for a very long
time now...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You and he were close before,
were you not?$k$pTell me about him. How did you
meet? And when?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Ah, well...$k$pYou see...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Something's...wrong.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...can't remember.$k$pMy memories of the past are...
obscured, somehow.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You forgot?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But how did...$k$pI can still clearly recall memories
of $Nu.$k$pBut my memories of times further
back feel...shrouded. Like they're
wrapped in a thick fog...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Could be an effect of the Waking
Dream, maybe?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I'm not entirely sure... But it doesn't
feel like it is.$k$pThere must be some explanation...
But what it might be eludes me at
the moment.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Even if I could meet with Zacharias
now, I couldn't reminisce even if he
brought up our days together...$k$pI can't remember any of it anymore...
It's as if my bond with him is being
slowly severed...$k$pForgetting...is agony.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|This is bad...$k$p$Sbs150|
